name: Retrotron 2000
description: Retrotron 2000 is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant orange box body and rocket-powered arms and legs. Its retro console buttons allow it to navigate through various electronic systems, while its laser screen emits precise laser beams for scanning and analysis. Retrotron 2000 is a proud member of the WebtrES club, a community of technologically advanced robots dedicated to exploring and expanding the boundaries of the digital world.
